name: Reasonable Man
description:
This was taken outside a hospital. I was sitting in the tea shop smoking and I could see him. This grandpa never went inside the hospital but he was worried. He just stood there near gates and every few minutes he will turn and stare at the hospital. I felt him. 

I believe we all are capable of immense kindness and if I send you this token, then I see your kindness. I think you are a wonderful human being. You don't need my affirmation for that, but I want to show you that I appreciate you.
